dialogues.text: And then you saved me, man! I fucking love you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I fucking love you, too, man! I'm not embarrassed, I just love you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we say that more? It feels good! I love you more than my brother, man. Like, when you went away for Easter last year, I, like, missed you. You know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I missed you, too. Come here, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seth grabs Evan and they hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll always be friends. `Cause we love each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stop hugging and sit back down. They're laughter slo down and there is a moment of silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like, three weeks ago I was in you room and, like, you were taking a dump and...I saw your residence placement thingy. I totally saw you're living with Fogell. So, like-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be! Don't be! I'm sorry. I was being a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need you to know that it's not like I even want to live with Fogell; it's just that I'm really afraid of living with strangers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a moment of silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know...I was pissed off I didn't get with Jules, but, like...we really got through a lot of our shit, you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, me too. Like, yeah...at least we kind of came together, again. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good night, Seth. I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night, Evan. Love you, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 148 Evan wakes up and looks over at Seth, who is also waking. They look at each other extremely awkwardly, almost as th they drunkenly had sex with each other last night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh...uh...hey. Morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh...morning. They stare at each other, uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sleep good?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. This is a really good pillow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um... Seth looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I should get going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to. I'm not, like, doing anything. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh...do you want to hang out? I was...gonna go to the mall, actually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Cool, well, can I come? I need a comforter. For college.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. That'd be nice. I'd really like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 149 Evan is standing in the pants section of a department sto Seth walks out of the dressing room wearing jeans that ar way too small.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't ask me. I don't give a shit if your pants look good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I need someone's opinion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. They're way too small.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but when I was wearing your dad's pants last night I realized that if I buy pants that are too small it'll encourage me to lose weight. And in tight pants chicks'll kind of see my dick a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, the male camel toe look is really big this year.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seth goes back into the dressing room and wriggles out of pants. He walks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These pants suck. Let's the get the fuck out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 150 They walk through the department store, when suddenly, Ev sees Helen and Jules looking at comforters. ANGLE ON: Helen and Jules

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again, I'm so sorry. I can't believe I actually did that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel sorry that I'm making you buy me a new one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to. It's puke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON: Seth and Evan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen looks like hell and Jules has a horrible black eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare at the two girls from afar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should we hide?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen looks and notices them. She waves and points them o to Jules. Seth and Evan wave back. The girls get up and s to walk over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pretending to smile) Fuck that, man. I can't talk to her, look what I did to her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pretending to smile) Helen called me a pussy to my face! What am I going to say to her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girls walk up to them. HELEN                                JULES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Evan, Seth.                       Hey guys. EVAN                                 SETH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Helen, Hi Jules.                  Jules. Helen. Hi. Everyone looks very embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god. I'm so sorry, Jules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Helen)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you feeling?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad, but not great, how about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jules)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That looks terrible. No! I mean, it doesn't look terrible, it looks-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about it, Seth. It was an accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Helen)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you have fun last night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Seth)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you remember much?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Evan)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I really don't remember much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jules)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not really. I remember looking up, and you screaming at me. That's about it. Jules laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Evan)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't puke on you, did I? Evan laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I dodged it. Whizzed right by me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jules)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But seriously, I acted like a fuckin' idiot last night. I'm really sorry, you didn't deserve that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Evan)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I...um...I'm sorry, about all that. Thanks for being such a gentleman. There is a moment of silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look good with a black eye. They all chuckle a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, smart guy. That's why I'm here. I have to go to Macy's to get a shitload of cover-up for the grad photo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mortified)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh man...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, and I'm going to Linen Brothers to buy Jules a new comforter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! I have to get a comforter too, for college.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (flirtatiously, joking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, you gonna come with me to Macy's and buy me my cover-up, or what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Definitely. I'd love to. I had such bad acne last year, I became an expert on the stuff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could get your college pants there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but wait...you drove me here, Evan drove me here, how do we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got my dad's car. I'll take you home, and Evan can give Helen a lift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sounds good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we can go eat after?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet. Seth and Evan look at each other, odd smiles on both thei faces. They didn't blow it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, uh, I'll call you later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah man, have a good one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Seth. Let's go. Jules pulls Seth away. Evan and Helen start walking in th opposite direction. As they walk away from one another, Seth and Evan look ba and give each other a small and yet emotionally-charged w A SLOW, GUT WRENCHING SOUL SONG STARTS TO PLAY. They look though they're never going to see each other again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 151 As Jules and Seth walk into Macy's and Helen and Evan des an escalator, the music swells to a mind-fuckingly awesom crescendo, and we humbly fade to black...

dialogues.speaker: END CREDIT SEQUENCE
dialogues.text: We flip through Seth's seemingly endless penis drawings f childhood. They are hilarious.
